posts.post_content:
Reasonable offers considered as always, but "I'll take it" supersedes ongoing negotation - prices include shipping.

Thanks for looking

T207 Cunningham, Senators - Tougher Anonymous-25 back SGC 1.5  $SOLD


Mogridge, White Sox - SGC AU - Not sure why this is graded Authentic - nothing obvious.  Nice looking card -  $SOLD
NOTE: Mogridge is one of the great underestimated rarities in the set.  The last time I did a population survey of T207, which was in 2018, I was surprised to see that overall, there were fewer graded copies of Mogridge than any other card, even Donlin (see below).  


Sweeney, Doves - Poor - the Front appears VG, back has obvious damage and scrapbook paste residue   $90


In case you're interested, here were the 2018 pops for the 50 Broad Leaf/Cycle/Anon cards (PSA and SGC).  (I should do a new one but it'll probably be January before I can get to it):
